inn1.comm: lovely start from Mitch. A beautiful inswinging delivery and it curves in on the  off stump line. LBW shout but is turned down. It was pad first. And that looks pretty much straight. The umpire must have thought it was bat first but replays  confirm that it was PAD  first. The ball was curving in and would have hit the off stump.
pushed across Gibbs who lets it go through to the keeper
pushed towards mid-off and they set off for a very quick single,. Ponting gets to the ball but slips when he is about to throw and the ball rolls out of his hand
full, just outside off, hint of movement, tentatively pushed to cover
full again, Smith takes a itsy bitsy tiny step forward and defends to the on side
shuffles across to defend a length delivery to the on side of the pitch
another inswinger, this one lands on the blockhole on the off stump line, Gibbs takes care this time not to press the front leg across and digs it out to the off side
leans forward to turn the full delivery to short midwicket fielder. One slip and short midwicket in.
overpitched and bit of width on offer and Gibbs leans across to off drive it through wide mid-off region.
full and on the off and middle line, steered to point region
gets forward to push the full delivery past the non-striker and the mid-on gets back to pull back the ball with a sliding effort.
gets in line to guide the ball to backward point
well outside the off stump, Gibbs frees his arms but can't reach.
short in length, angling away, pushed to the off side.
fuller, on the middle stump line, shaping away, but nothing alarming, and Gibbs leans forward, pushes it wide of mid-on for a single
Two slips in place and Smith is slightly late in getting forward to defend. The ball rolls of the inside edge on to the pad and bobs away to the off side. They steal the run.

a very good slower ball and very well adjusted by Gibbs. It was outside off stump, full and Gibbs checked his off drive. But he loosened the bottom-hand grip and gave direction with the top hand and found the extra-cover gap. And what's more he timed it pretty neatly
in the zone outside off stump and Gibbs lets it go through to the keeper
shuffles across and runs down a short-of-length delivery to third man
on back of length, on the middle stump line, Gibbs hops across and works it past square leg
angled across Gibbs who shoulders arms
full and moving away from Gibbs, the keeper collects.
And again. Gibbs has been patient so far. Can he continue to remain in that way? Bracken will surely test him out
Another one moving through the corridor, Gibbs doesn't play a shot
fullish, just outside off stump, Smith prefers to stay inside the crease and just pushes the bat out and steers it to point
full and coming in to the middle and leg line, Smith stumbles out - he is being caught at the crease today-  and the ball thuds into the pad.. going down leg, though...
length delivery just outside off stump, Smith opens the bat-face and pings backward point
fuller, on the off and middle line, Smith uses that bottom-hand to turn the ball past square leg
slightly short in length and Gibbs goes for his pull shot but mistimes it to the on side. His weight was on the front foot before he tried to press back and lost his timing in the process
fuller, from that round-arm action now, on the off and middle, Gibbs leans forward to push it back down the pitch
The first really timed stroke of the day from the SA captain. It was on the legs and Smith flicked it away past the square-leg fielder.
tries to move forward, Geeves digs it in short at the rib-cage, tucked to fine leg
length delivery, moving in from outside off stump, leans forward to defend to the off side
And here is Gibbs' best timed shot of the day. He skipped down the track, waited for the length delivery to arrive before timing it past the non-striker
leans forward to defend to the off side of the pitch. Free hit coming up. Geeves under pressure.

The crowd cheer. It was short in length outside off stump, Gibbs goes for the pull off the front foot, didn't time it well actually but got the placement right and the ball runs away to the deep square-leg boundary
moves forward to push it to covers
Two slips watch anxiously as Smith is beaten outside off stump. Bit of extra bounce outside off, Smith was trying to chop it down to third man but the ball flies above the blade
And this time the slips celebrate. It was a short-of-length delivery moving away from Smith who hangs his bat out to dry and gets the thick edge through to the lunging Haddin.
well outside off stump, full in length, left alone
This is certainly a slow pitch and timing is going to be hard to find. Kallis is early into the drive and the ball rolls away to the off side
on the middle, from a length, defended to the off side of the pitch
goes back and across to punch a short-of-length delivery to point
gets back and across to push to short cover. It's a sort of a pitch where short cover and short midwicket are going to come very handy
leans forward to defend to the off side
leans forward to run it to the left of backward point where Clarke stops and fires down a direct hit at the striker's end.
on a length, around the off stump line, defended to the off side
short in length, 144.6 kmph says the radar, hmmm...., pushed to the point region
slower one, just outside off stump, again pushed to left of Clarke at backward point
stands with his bat held in the air, plants his front leg across, just prior to the release itself and Johnson round -arms it towards the hips and the ball rolls away off the pad
the slower one, around 126 kmph, full delivery around the off stump, pushed to mid-off
140.02 kph, full delivery well outside off stump, Kallis goes for the big cover drive but pushes his bat outside the line of the ball
moves forward, towards the line of the delivery slanted across him and guides to point
on the middle stump line, back of length, turned to short midwicket
huh! what was that. It was the full length delivery outside off stump, Kallis went for the slog across the line and missed it completely.
the slow yorker, around the off stump, Gibbs is on the front foot, waits and as the ball dips on him, he nudges it to the on side
skips down the track and defends to the off side
short in length, coming in to the middle, worked past square leg
slightly short in length, outside off stump, run down to third man
The slower one, around 128 kmph, length delivery outside off stump, Gibbs tries to adjust late by trying a dab shot to third man but can't get wood on leather.
fullish, outside off stump, again Kallis is early into his off drive on this sluggish slow track and the ball runs off the inner edge to backward square leg
the slower one, rolling his cutters across, worked to square leg
comes down the track and goes for the big drive straight down the ground but finds the sticks at the other end. FWIW, Gibbs was outside his crease as well but Bracken didn't get any hand on that.
leans forward to drive to cover
shuffles right across the stumps, ends up outside off stump, Bracken pushed it outside off and Kallis drives superbly past the bowler and to the boundary
moves across the sticks again, Bracken pushes it even wider outside off, Kallis reaches out to run it down to third man
on the middle and off line, on a length, leans forward to defend to the off side
takes couple of steps down the track, stays adjacent to the line of a short-of-length delivery on the off and middle, and punches it forcefully but can't beat cover
dabs this down to third man for a single.
short in length, around off stump, pushed very close on the off side and they rush across for a single

Kallis is rocking. He has decided that he is going to be aggressive today. Again, couple of steps down the pitch, again stays adjacent to the line and punches the back-of-length delivery through cover point

Full and around the leg stump, Kallis tries to flick it away and the tv comms reckon it went off the pad and Haddin 'catches' it. I thought it went off the bat face, actually. Let me see if there is a replay. Anyway, free hit coming up.
tries to force another one through the off side but can't find the gap
Haddin is standing up to the stump and hops to collect this. Gibbs was trying to run it down through the vacant slip region but doesn't connect
Now we have a slip in place. Gibbs was trying to paddle sweep but pulls out of the shot as Bracken pushes it outside off stump and Haddin gathers the chest-high delivery pretty well
full delivery, on the middle stump line, turned to square leg region
yet another slower delivery , on the off stump line, driven straight to cover
full pitched outside off stump, square driven to point
full pitched on the middle stump line, pushed down to mid-on
length delivery around the off stump line, defended to the off side
comes down the pitch, Geeves drags back the length and keeps it outside off, pushed to cover
allows the back-of-length delivery to come in to him and wrists it away past square leg

again goes for the big drive, Ponting moves swiftly to his left at mid-off  and not only makes a diving stop but also gets up so quickly that he fires in a throw at the striker's end. What a fine fielder.
around the off stump line, pushed to the off side
short in length ,just outside off stump, guided to backward point
pushed across Kallis who goes back to run it down to third man. The keeper is standing up. A very good crowd in and they cheer the fifty

Gibbs loses patience with the sluggish track and finds the deep midwicket fielder. He went down on his back knee to swing the slower one but found more elevation than distance. Hopes runs forward and gets under the ball.
lands around the leg stump, moves in towards middle, worked to wide midwicket region for a single
slanted across AB, who tries to run it down to third man but sends it straight, along the ground, to wide sole slip in place
full in length, angled across, cut down to point
another one of those cutters, the off cutter this time, goes past the forward prod and Haddin collects. Bracken, as ever, is bowling quite a few off cutters. And it's perfect for this slow track
floated full outside off stump, driven to deep cover.
leans forward to turn it to the on side
turns in from outside off, AB lunges across and is hit on the pad, trying to defend.
lands it full outside off, flicked to backward square leg
leans across to flick through midwicket to the man at the deep
spins in from outside off stump, dabbed through cover point for a single
full in length, width outside off stump and Kallis crashes it through cover point. The bat completes the full arc as the ball races away through the packed off-side field
leans forward to drive another slow delivery to mid-off
the slip comes out and we have a sweeper cover in place now. Kallis tries to run down a well-outside-off delivery but can't connect.
Bracken continues with his off cutters . This one is around 116 kmph, full delivery slanted across Kallis who dabs it down to third man
around 116 k again, slightly short in length, cut to point
112.1 k. almost an off break and AB pushes inside the line as the ball goes through to Haddin, standing up to the stumps.
stretches across to push to extra cover
turning in from outside off, defended to the off side
shuffles across, flicks the full delivery from outside off to backward square leg
floated well outside off stump, Kallis stretches across to cover drive it to sweeper cover
moves across to sweep from outside-off to long-leg for a single.
drifted outside off, pushed to cover. 61 for 2 in 18 overs.
short in length, outside off, AB moves forward and across to short-arm pull it to deep backward square leg
punches through the off side to sweeper cover for a run
full in length, just outside off stump, AB bends his knees and punches it away to point

slightly short in length, just outside off, wristed to midwicket, where Ponting fires in a throw at the non-striker's end but misses. Had he hit, it would have got really interesting. Ponting holds his head
pushed through the off side for a single
full pitched outside off, Kallis crashes it hard through the off side  but the sweeper cover gets across to cut it off
gets across, outside off and flicks it to midwicket
again turned from outside off to the on side
leans across to defend
drops it short and AB latches on to it, gets across the stumps and pulls it to deep square leg boundary
stretches across to sweep but slips! the ball runs away to backward square leg
shuffles right across, exposing all the three sticks,, and flicks a full delivery from outside off to backward square leg
on a length, straightening around the middle and leg line, clipped past square leg
threatens to move outside leg before moving towards off stump, Hopes keeps it outside off and is run down to left of third man
Haddin stands up to the stumps. Full in length, on the middle, deflected to midwicket
on the off stump line, chopped away through cover point for a single
stands tall to drive to sweeper cover
just outside off stump, from back of length, run down to third man
moves outside off again and works it to right of midwicket for a single
floated full outside off stump, Kallis goes for the big off drive and edges it through the vacant slip region
goes back, waits for the ball to turn in before opening the bat-face and playing a deft little late cut
moves forward to push it down to long-on for a single
really well up to the bat, around the off stump, Kallis opens the bat-face and plays a neat square drive through point region
Kallis moves across like AB and pinches a single with a wristy shot past midwicket
flighted off break outside off stump, driven to deep cover for a single . Two off spinners in action now.
quicker one, pushed to the on side of the pitch
dipping full outside off stump, driven to left of long-on for a single
gets forward to square drive it to right of backward point
full and outside off, driven down to long-on again for yet another single
flatter, just down leg side, tickled straight to short fine-leg
dipping delivery on the middle, AB is on the off stump line, stumbles a bit as he turns it to short fine-leg
leans forward to loft it wide of long-on for couple of runs
on the off and middle line, driven to right of the bowler who makes a diving stop
quicker, full again, pushed to the on side.
goes right back and across to work a delivery from outside off to deep backward square leg region
floated full outside off, driven to extra cover
quick and full, on the off and middle, pushed back to David
similar delivery, this time AB wrists it to deep midwicket
really full, on the middle, Kallis on drives and David makes a diving stop to his right
leans across to drive to sweeper cover where Michael Hussey stops
flicks it from around off to the on side but can't beat midwicket
full, quickish, flat, driven down to long-on
shout for lbw but Rudi is not interested. It was flighted full on the off stump line, AB got across and went for the sweep and was perhaps struck just outside off
worked through the on side for a run
pushes this to cover point for a single
moves forward to ping long-on
slower, turning in towards off stump, tapped to left of backward point and brings up the 100
coming in ever so slowly of this sluggish track, defended to the off side
backs away to play a feisty cut shot but Michael moves quickly to his right at deep cover to cut it off
fuller, pushed through the off-side for a single
flat and quick, on the middle, deflected past square leg and they run hard to come back for the second
on the middle and leg, turned to deep backward square leg

almost yorker length on the off and middle, Kallis gets his bat down in a hurry and some how, manages to open the bat face to squeeze it to third man. Very good ball and even better adjusted by the batsman.
retains the strike with a dab shot through off side
Haddin is standing up to the stumps. The 113.3 kmph off cutter, bouncing in from outside leg stump, defended to the on side of the pitch
fuller, on the off and middle line, Kallis stays adjacent to the line and drives to deep cover. 50 up and the crowd clear their throat.
stays back to punch another off cutter through to deep cover
fuller,  around 114 k, on the off and middle, driven to long-off
goes back to punch a 119 k length delivery to long-off
another slow delivery, full, Kallis eases it to long-off
pitches on the stumps and he turns it wide of midwicket for one
there's a shot! de Villiers uses his feet and swings it over midwicket, picking the gap nicely between two men in the deep
quicker, flatter, straighter and driven back down the track
again he uses his feet and clips it uppishly past midwicket
tossed up outside off stump and Kallis pushes into the covers
a bit of room and he goes back and slaps it into the off side
pitches back of a length on middle and leg and whipped away
a touch shorter outside off and de Villiers defends it to cover
back of a length on off, he shuffles nicely and turns it past square
very full and wide, he reaches out to slice it but loses balance, anyway its decently placed but a diving point cuts off the single really well
walks right across the sticks and tries to clip a fuller ball away from outside off stump but cannot find the gap
bangs in a short ball, he latches onto it from outside off stump but pulls it into the ground in front of midwicket, some good fast running gets them two off the last ball
pitches fullish on the stumps and defended to the on side
angles wide off a shortish length and he opens the face at the last second to dab it down to third man for a single, smart batting to keep the singles ticking over
leans into a fullish delivery and drives handsomely to extra cover, where a dive cannot cut off the run
pitches full again, onto the front foot and driven to cover
pitches on off stump and he drives it straight down the ground
again smartly executed by Kallis, opening the face to steer a slower ball down to third man for a single. It was 109 kmph.
on the off stump line, shuffles across, tries to work it through midwicket but can only get it back to the bowler
on the off stump line, punched to right of third man for couple of runs
moves outside leg, Johnson round-arms a full delivery outside off and Kallis tries to reach out but can't connect
just outside off, full, driven down to deep cover
slightly short in length, dabbed down to cover point
well outside off, full, 142.4 kmph, Kallis attempts the big cover drive but makes no connection
short in length, pulled away but straight to deep backward square leg
short in length and outside off, mistimes the cut, edges it close to the off side and they pinch a single
fuller, around off stump, the ball stops on this slow track and AB checks his drive and the ball is in the air but falls short of cover
Thump! It was a touch short in length, coming in from outside off, AB pulls it off the front foot and gets it past Ponting at midwicket
pushes this through the off side for a single
length delivery around off stump, punched to wide mid-off for yet another single
128 kph length delivery outside off stump, Kallis opens the bat-face and dabs it to third man
slightly short in length, cuts hard but can''t beat Clarke at backward point
beaten by the slower one. It bounces in , AB goes for his signature short-arm pull ,misses and it goes off his thigh pad, bounces before Haddin who fumbles
fuller, around off stump, square driven to deep point. Free hit coming up
The slower one, full and just outside off, AB goes down on a bent back knee and ends up slicing it high towards long-on who allows it to bounce in front before throwing
driven through the on side for a single and that's his 50. The crowd show their appreciation for this skillful knock on a very sluggish track
pushes to the on side and gets across for a quick single, there is a direct hit but he is home
on the off stump line, Kallis chops it to short third man region for a single
full in length, on the middle, driven down to long-on for a single
just outside off, shaping in, Kallis waits, opens the bat-face and late cuts it down to third man
charges out, Hopes cuts this one back in from short of length towards the middle stump, AB manages to chop it down to wide third man region
cutting into middle and leg line, around 128 kph, jabbed away to square leg
moves towards the offside, gets outside the line almost and flicks the ball from middle stump to deep square leg
fires in a bouncer on the middle stump line, Kallis was looking to step down the track and sways away from the line
drops the ball close on the off side, one look at each other and off they scamper across for  a run
short in length, cutting into middle, that short-arm pull powered by the bottom hand again fetches him a single
just outside off stump, placed close to the off side, towards gully for a single and Clarke can't prevent another single
fuller, on the middle stump line, driven down to long-on for a single
Kallis falls after a fine innings. It was banged in short outside off stump, Kallis goes for the pull but hits it straight to midwicket!
full pitched outside off stump and AB square drives it past the diving Clarke for couple of runs
full again but drifting towards the pads, wristed away for another couple of runs, this time behind square leg
beaten outside off .. It straightened off the good length, de Villiers tried to punch a cover drive on the up but pushed inside the line

full in length, just outside off stump, de Villiers eases forward to play a lovely on-the-up drive to left of mid-off where much to the astonishment of the all the Aussie fielders, Bracken doesn't put in a dive and there is no stopping that
lapped around the corner on the leg side for a single

the home boy was almost run out first ball. It was punched to  cover where Ponting misfielded and the ball rolled to his right. Duminy hared down the track, AB sent him back and the throw isn't great and Duminy rushes back in time
leans forward to drive it back to the bowler
short in length, 124.8 k, AB is early with his pull shot and squeezes it to long leg for a single
full in length, around off stump line, defended to the off side
leans forward to drive to mid-off
gets behind the line of a length delivery around off stump and defends to the off side
shorter in length, tapped towards mid-on and they scamper across for the single
full and on the off stump line, Duminy doesn't move forward or back, just bends his knees to hold balance and guides the ball down to third man

Edges past the diving Haddin. It was the slower one, full outside off, AB went for the big off drive and edges it through the vacant slip region. Haddin really went full stretch there but couldn't reach
worked through the on side for a single
floated across full, around off, driven to left of cover where Ponting makes a tumbling stop
full in length, outside off stump, driven to deep cover
Crunch! It was back-of-length delivery outside off and AB moved across to flay it through extra cover.
paddles the ball from the off stump line to fine leg
yorker length, but drifting down leg, rolls off the boot to the on side. Oh there must have been edge, Rudi gives it away as runs ..
again that paddle shot to fine leg and he comes back for the second run
And Duminy eases this to right of cover for a single
Edges through vacant slip region. It was full, quickish, and just outside off, AB tries to drive it through extra cover but gets a nice little fat edge
slows up the pace, tosses it outside off, de Villiers goes for the big sweep ,misses and is struck outside off
fires it in full and drifting to the pads, Duminy tries to flick it away, misses as the ball curves in more than he thinks and it rolls off the pad to fine leg
de Villiers moves outside leg, Mitch tries to follow him and serves a short of length delivery on the hips, AB tries to get the short-arm-pull going but misses and it rolls off the thigh pad
leans forward to flick to midwicket, Hauritz with the throw but doesn't find the stumps at the striker's end

It was a length delivery on the middle and leg and it stops on AB who checks his across-the-line waft but gets a leading edge - a simple dolly- to mid-off. Fine innings from AB, who paced this one really well.
a inswinging yorker but slipping to the pads as a result and Duminy flicks it to deep backward square leg
runs away off the pad to short fine leg, Duminy thought he can sneak a run but was sent back, wisely, by his partner. Ponting throws down the stumps.
from round the stumps, on the off stump line, driven to cover
Ponting reckons Albie might not be so fluent against a spinner on a slow track. This one is on the off and middle, pushed to the off side
pushes this through flatter, on the leg and middle, worked past square leg for a single
drifting in towards leg stump, Duminy stays outside leg and pushes it to the off side for a single
full and on the middle, driven  back to Hauritz
full again, right up there, on the middle, pushed back to the bowler. Fine over this from Hauritz.
low full toss on the leg and middle, flicked straight to deep square leg
leans forward to push a slower one - around 115 k- to cover for a single
Duminy clears the front foot and goes for the big swing to the leg side; doesn't quite time it but it falls just short of long-on
full and straight, driven to left of Hauritz at long-on for a single
The good ol' slog is out but Duminy can't get any meat on it.. it rolls to square leg off the edge
flicked past square leg for a single ...
short in length, around middle and leg, worked to backward square leg
almost caught by the diving Michael Clarke at long-on. It was swung towards long-on; Clarke charged out and threw in a dive but couldn't reach .. Now Clarke moves to mid-on... fine-leg goes back
bangs in a high bouncer. Wide called and the crowd roar
full in length, outside leg, Albie is further down leg, has a big swing but is too early with the shot on this track and the ball bounds away off the pad to the off side
similar delivery, Duminy clears the front foot, lunges out to bottom-hand it high over square leg. He got the timing right, there.

oh the above waist-high full toss on the off stump line, Duminy goes for the pull and it flies off the edge over the keeper. Ponting rushes to have a chat with the umpire. It was indeed a high full toss
dropped by Ferguson at long-off clears the front foot and goes for the big drive down the ground and Ferguson runs in from long-off, lunges out but drops the catch.
driven through the off side for a single. The action-packed over comes to an end. Swing over square -leg, a high full toss edged over keeper and a drop catch near the boundary

Wow! Duminy, would you believe it, has paddle scooped Mitch! It was a length delivery around off stump, Duminy paddles it over the short fine-leg fielder! Mitchell is not impressed and has a few words to say
moves outside leg stump and flays a short-of-length delivery but crashes it straight to cover! Mitchell roars. Duminy falls after a 26-ball 32
full in length, outside leg stump, tries to swing it to the on side and it rolls away off the pad to the off side
leans forward to drive to mid-off for a single
from round the stumps, 112.7 kmph, full length delivery on the off and middle, pushed through cover point
fullish, outside off, from over the wicket, around 125 km, Albie is yet to find his mojo on this slow track, is again early with his swing and the ball rolls off the edge to square leg
leans across to punch the length delivery to deep cover
well up, outside the off stump, Albie tries to chop it away but doesn't make contact
wide outside off stump this time and Rudi extends his arms
127.7 kph, low dipping full toss, Albie makes contact with the bottom half of the bat and gets just a single down to long-on
from round the stumps , around 113 km, full length delivery, Boucher waits and drives well but straight to cover.

What a fine short-arm-pull! It was slightly short in length, on the leg and middle line, Albie lifted his front leg in the air as he shifted his weight to his back foot and pulled it to deep backward square leg boundary
fuller in length, pushed across Albie who mistimes the across-the-line drag to mid-on for a single
well outside the off stump, Boucher reaches out to drive to right of cover, deflected to long-off
the slower one , around 117 k, very full and outside off, Albie checks his shot, tries to get bat on ball but doesn't
133 k yorker outside off, Albie backs away to chop it to left of third man for couple of runs
Another really well up delivery outside off, again Albie chops it away to wide third man region
full delivery outside off stump, driven really hard to long-off

from round the stumps to the right-handed Boucher - third man and fine-leg up in the circle- and Bracken pushes it outside leg and Boucher laps it around the corner to deep backward square leg boundary.

clears the front foot and kills a length delivery on the off stump line high and just over long-on. It went high up in the air, Clarke was interested till the last moment but it dipped over him in the end
short of blockhole, driven hard down the pitch, Bracken deflects it off his right leg and they run hard to come back for the second run
driven through mid-off for a single
Thwack! A six  on a bent back knee! It was the low full toss outside off and Albie went down on his back knee and creamed it high over long-off.
He has killed it. Brutal. It was full delivery outside off and Boucher hammers it over long-on. The crowd go mad.
drags this length delivery from outside off to deep midwicket
fullish, on the middle and leg, swung to the deep midwicket region where Ponting makes the stop
slower one, short in length outside off, Boucher is made to wait and he pulls it down to deep midwicket
on the leg and middle, swung away to deep square leg region
clears the front foot and drags the slower one from outside off to deep backward square leg
Johnson tries the slower one, around 127 kmph, Albie moves away, waits, reaches out to slice it over short third man.. No one in the deep there...
backs away, Johnson round-arms a full delivery on the off stump line, Albie tries to swing to the cowcorner but misses. Timber!
takes a step forward and goes for a big swing across the line but doesn't put bat to ball
Mitch fires in a bouncer, he goes for a blind pull but no wood on leather again!
Violence! Third time lucky.  He clears the front foot and murders a length delivery way way over the midwicket boundary.
Swing and a miss to finish things off. Haddin collects. SA finish on 289 for 6

inn2.comm: full, fast, tilting in towards middle stump line, pushed back to Steyn
139.2 kmph length delivery outside off stump, left alone
leans forward to defend a length delivery to the off side
outside off stump line, guided to point region
slips this down leg side and Boucher collects
full and straight, leans forward to drive to mid-on
leans forward to push to wide mid-off region
shout for lbw but it lands outside leg stump and skidded on quickly, Haddin was on the hop and was struck high on the pad
angling away from Haddin who shoulders arms

almost a mix-up. It was pushed towards mid-off, Clarke was caught ball-watching .. responds late but Smith doesn't release the throw; the ball seemed to have slipped in his heavily-strapped right hand
stands up tall to punch a length delivery to cover
140.02 kmph, back of length, straightening on the middle, punched back to the bowler who flings it to Boucher
full, straight on the middle, Haddin plays a pick-up shot over midwicket. The bat handle rotated in his hands bit more than he would have wanted but he clears midwicket and the ball raced away
full and on the middle, looking for swing but no movement yet, driven to mid-on
again looking for swing, pushed to right of mid-on for a single
151.6 kmph length delivery outside off stump, skidding away quickly, left alone. Over 151k says the speed meter.
a slower one now, around 130 k, full and just outside off stump, Haddin stabs it off the outer edge past the second slip and through to third man
145.1 kph, on the middle stump line, pushed towards mid-on
back of length, around the off stump, pushed to extra cover
141.1 kph, angling away from back of length, pushed to wide mid-off for a single
141.1 kph, short in lengh, hitting the deck hard, on the middle, defended to the off side
fuller, around 135 kph, on the middle and off, driven down the track, deflected away by the lunging bowler and Smith runs back from mid-on to push it back
gets forward, towards the line of the length delivery on off and pushes it to Smith at mid-off
back of length, outside off, angling away, mistimes a punchy shot to short cover region
well outside off stump, tries to reach out but can't
slower one, outside off stump, left alone
143.6 kph, on a length just outside off stump, Haddin defends it back down the pitch
128 kph slow and fuller outside off, Haddin checks his bat swing, opens the bat-face and runs it down to third man
full in length, outside off stump, driven on the up to right of cover where Duminy makes a fine diving half-stop and the ball rolls to mid-off
142.9 kph full length delivery on the off stump, driven crisply but straight to Steyn who gets his right hand to it. Ouch he is in pain.
151.5 kph full and fast, just outside off stump, Haddin shuffles across to stab it off the inner edge to his pad and he makes sure it doesn't roll to his stumps
134.2 kph full delivery on the middle, Clarke presses his front leg dangerously across, manages to stop the movement and get his bat down in time to push it to mid-off
length delivery around the off stump, defended to the off side
short in length, on the middle and leg, turned to square leg
136.8 kph, length delivery around the off stump, Haddin gets his bat down behind the line to defend to the off side

leans forward to push it towards mid-on, the bowler dives to his right but he doesn't cover it and the batsmen get across for a single. Clarke, again, had not taken off and he crossed over only after the bowler failed to stop. Haddin was half-way down the track
length delivery angling away from Clarke who dabs it for a single
bangs it in short and outside off, straightening a bit, left alone
fuller, around 143 kph, just outside off stump, driven hard to the off side where Gibbs, at short cover, deflects it to Smith at mid-off
full in length, around off stump, driven into the ground and it bounces to Steyn who hurts his left hand this time!
swing and a miss. Length delivery skidding on outside off stump, Haddin tries to slice it over point but doesn't  make contact
148.2 kph, full in length outside off, driven to Gibbs at short cover
142.7 kph, hits the good length outside off stump, Haddin leans forward to defend to short cover
fullish, on the middle, gets the bat around the front pad to push it to right of mid-on
the run-rate is sneaking up and Haddin goes for a big swing over mid-on and edges it to his pad and to square leg
leans forward to defend to the on side

137 kph, on a length, just outside off, Clarke pushes it to mid-off. Tight line and length continues from both bowlers. No great movement on offer so far. It has just skidded on a tad quicker under lights
punched to left of cover where Duminy makes a fine diving stop
gets forward to push it to the on side
The run-rate pressure again forces Haddin to back away and go very hard at the off drive, can't beat Smith at mid-off. Smith now has a chat with Steyn.
151.8 kph, kicking up from back of length, Haddin chops it to third man
leans forward to push it towards mid-off and they run with the stroke
the bouncer outside off stump, Haddin was on the front foot and sways away quickly
the slower one arrives outside off stump, full, guided to left of third man
another slower one, full and on the middle, leans across to tap it to right of midwicket for a single..  Haddin is looking edgy, wanting to up the run rate but the bowling has been tight so far.
stands up tall to push it to the off side. Aus need 262 runs more
again mistimes another on drive as he keeps pushing that front leg too much across and then has to get his bat around the front pad. In all that movement, the timing goes for a toss.
fullish, driven to mid-on for a single. Haddin goes slightly hard into the shot and the bat-face shut at the point of impact

Duminy has run out Haddin. It was pushed to his left at cover and they hare down the track. Duminy moves swiftly, swoops on the ball, takes aim and fires down a direct hit at the striker's end. They go up stairs and the verdict is OUT
Ponting walks in and does quite a few stretches. He is ready now. Here we go. A inside edge to start off. It was full in length, Ponting drove outside the line and edged it to his pad
lunges out in his typical fashion, the ball straightens around off and Ponting quickly gets his bat in front of his pad to defend

129.1 kph back of length delivery outside off, Clarke edges his cut shot back behind the stumps and Ponting calls him over for the quick single. Boucher whips his gloves off and fires in a throw at the non-striker's end. Clarke, cleverly, runs between the throw and the stumps and the ball hits his boot
slower one, on the middle stump line, pushed out to the leg side
leans forward to drive to mid-on
quicker, just outside off stump, Ponting pushes at it, the bat coming down in an angle and the ball rolls back to the bowler
short in length, straightening outside off stump, steered to point
gets on the front foot to play a very compact defensive push to the off side
overpitched around the off stump line and Clarke lashes out to cream it between the bowler and mid-off
drags back the length and punched to cover
on a length, around the off stump, mistimes the drive- again he has to get his bat aroung that front pad- towards mid-on and they rush across for the single

dropped by Boucher. It was the length delivery angling away from Ponting who stabs it behind and Boucher lunges forward and to his right but it seems to have fallen just short and as he rolls over the ball slips out of his gloves .. It was not a easy chance but if Boucher was more alert and agile, he would have got his gloves under the ball

dropped by Kallis at first slip. Again, Ponting edges the ball going across him and it flies well to right of first slip and Kallis makes an acrobatic effort, almost ala Richie Richardson like full dive, but can only palm it away. Great effort.
leans forward to defend to the on side

Run out chance missed! It was pushed to midwicket and Ponting set off for the run. Albie reached the ball and Ponting found out late that he had to get back. Albie was on his knees, saw that Ponting was half-way down the pitch and lobbed the throw at the striker's end. Boucher thought that Albie would fire in a fast throw and went a few yards behind the stumps rather than running up to the stumps. The lob missed the stumps and went to bouhcer. There was still a chance of run out as Ponting had not reached the crease. Boucher tried to deflect it to the stumps but missed.
lunges out to defend a length delivery..
banged in short and Ponting pulls to break free of the tension .. what a sigh of relief that must be. Two edges and almost run out.. It's all happening here.
another pull shot and this time he gets three runs
full pitched on the middle, on driven to mid-on
leans across to deflect it behind square leg
yorker length on the middle stump, Ponting arrests his front foot movement and digs it out to the on side
full in length, tilting in from outside off stump, Ponting squeezes it through midwicket
leans forward to drive it back to the bowler who flings the ball back at the stumps and hits Ponting on the back
lunges out to jab it to the on side
leans forward to defend to the on side
short in length outside off stump, punched sweetly to deep cover
fullish, on the middle, driven to left of mid-on and he shouts out, 'wait on'
slower one, on the middle, pushed back to Kallis who fires the throw back the striker's end and Clarke lunges back into the crease
slower one again, full, pushed wide of mid-on where Steyn makes a very good diving stop
short in length, bouncing in, tucked to long-leg
flighted full around off, worked to midwicket
And again. Aus need 236 more to win. Botha hands over his jumper to the umpire
really quick delivery, around 97 kph, and almost traps him lbw. Ponting sees it late and somehow, manages to stab it to the on side
leans forward to push this to midwicket
slows up the pace, flighted outside off stump, and Ponting stretches forward to defend
And the fine over comes to an end. Another dot ball as Ponting wrists it to midwicket
full in length, Clarke goes for the off drive, goes too hard at the shot, the bat rotates in his hands and the bat-face shuts, the ball rolls to mid-on
tucked off the hips past square leg for a single and Duminy charges in from the deep t
banged in short, a bouncer , pulled down to the ground and to deep midwicket
length delivery outside off stump, guided down to third man
charges down the track and lifts the full delivery over the bowler's head for a fine four.
lunges out, edges it to his pad and the ball rolls towards point. Clarke is sent back by Ponting and he makes it back in time
flighted on the middle stump, pushed to the on side
on the middle and turned to deep midwicket region for a single
skips down the track, is beaten in the flight but it clips the inner edge and the pad and runs to fine-leg region. nicely bowled
moves forward to push it to long-on for a single

And Botha gets his man. He had tied him run-less in his first over and has struck in his second. It was flighted around the off stump line and Ponting skipped down the track and was beaten in the flight. Ponting jabbed it towards the non-striker and the bowler moved to his right and in the way of the nonstriker, nearly  getting tangled, to hold a good catch
leans forward to defend
slightly short in length, cut away to deep point
flighted full, driven to cover
from round the stumps, drifting in full, driven down to long-on
quicker, on the middle, pushed to cover
slower, full, on the middle again, turned to midwicket
leans forward to drive to long-off
leans forward to stab it to the off side
tapped to left of midwicket and they rush across for a run .. overthrows
moves forward to drive to long-on
full delivery on the middle, driven down to long-on
beaten in the flight and Hussey drives outside the line and the ball bounds away off the pad - point of impact outside off- towards point
drifts in from round the stumps, tries to flick it away but will pick up a leg bye
driven to right of mid-off, they think about a run but AB swoops on it and fires in a direct hit as well at the non-striker's end
backs away to cut from the middle, gets cramped as jabs it to point
leans forward to defend to cover
on the middle stump, backs away to cut away to right of point for a single. Lots of risk for just one run
tries to come down, fires it on the blockhole, dug out to cover
leans forward to push it to the on side
on the middle, worked behind square leg
slower in the air, bit more air, down the track and flicked to midwicket
well up there, driven to deep cover
reaches across to on drive to long-on
floated on the leg and middle line, worked to Kallis at deep midwicket

Clarke's misery ends. He skipped down the track, went for a heave across the line but the ball dipped on him rapidly and he missed it completely. Through this innings, he has not got his timing right and is gone now.
A silly point moves in now. Michael drives the flighted delivery to deep cover
on the middle and leg, flicked to deep midwicket
leans forward to defend to silly point
spins towards his pads, tries to turn it behind square leg, misses and it strikes the pad
floated well outside leg stump, misses the sweep and wide is called

Rudi misses the big inside edge and Mike Hussey storms off towards the pavilion. It turned in quickly from outside off stump, Hussey pressed back and stabbed it off the inner edge to his pad. Rudi fails to see it and gives him the slow death. Clearly very unlucky.
leans forward to flick it to midwicket
spinning in, works it behind square leg
floated full outside off, driven to deep cover
almost beaten in the flight there, lunges out to push it to the on side
on the middle stump line, goes on straight with bounce, jabbed away to the on side
quicker one, on the middle stump line, dabbed to square leg
leans forward to dab it past square leg
beaten on the drive. It drifted in before turning away sharply on this dry wicket
And again. Now Smith moves in a slip
leans forward to tap it to the on side
outside off stump, square driven to sweeper cover for a single
drifts in towards the middle line, lunges out to jab it to the on side
short in length, clipped uppishly through forward square leg region
fuller, driven back to the bowler
flicks it away to fine-leg and Steyn comes across to kick it away off his right boot
goes right back to work it to backward square leg
on the middle and leg. loopy delivery, turned again to backward square leg
flighted on the middle, shuffles across to work it through to deep midwicket
leans forward to drive to deep cover region
leans forward to drive to long-on
leans forward to drive to left of the bowler who dives and makes a half-stop
eases this to long-on
turning in from outside off, defended to the off side
a tad quicker, defended on the front foot
leans forward to ping long-on
flighted outside off stump, lifted over extra cover for couple of runs. 100 up for OZ
goes right back and outside off to clip it to deep midwicket region
flighted full, whipped to Kallis at deep midwicket
low full toss on the middle stump line, Ferguson paddles it away to the boundary, Very nicely played.
nice loopy delivery, dipping on the middle, driven down to long-on
full and flat on middle and leg and clipped toward mid-on
flat on middle and off, he makes room and drives past cover
tossed up on off stump, he pushes it back to the bowler
flat down the pads, clipped away into the midwicket area
full on the pads, Hussey on-drives it down the ground
nearly has his man! This one pitches and gets some grip, Ferguson backs away to steer it fine but is late on the shot and almost plays it back onto his stumps
tries the shot again but just cannot beat the infield, sharp work by AB
tossed up, he uses his feet and drives straighter this time
tossed up outside off, Ferguson hops across and tries to turn it away but gets struck on the flap well outside the line of impact
back to full and flat and Ferguson drives it toward mid-on
keeps it flat, Hussey comes down and clips it off his pads
flat and short, hit back down the track to Duminy
and he's worked a charm, has Duminy! Tosses it up, down comes Hussey, collecting on the volley but not getting the desired elevation and Steyn takes an easy catch coming in from long-on
flat outside off, Ferguson shuffles across and clips it past square
slows it up, tossed up on middle and off, turned to the on side
plants the front foot out and clips across the line to midwicket
tosses it up invitingly, he goes for a swing but cannot connect
quickish, on the middle and off, pushed to the off side
dipping full outside leg , the ball rolls off the boot to the on side
goes back to tuck it to deep backward square leg
turns from the leg stump line, defended to the on side
floated outside off, driven to deep point fielder ..
beaten outside off. It was a tad quicker, turned away from the off stump line and goes past the forward prod
leans forward to drive to long-off
on the middle stump line, deflected to short fine-leg
low full toss, swept to deep backward square leg
on the leg stump, another sweep shot for a single
quicker, on the legs, clipped behind square leg for a single
floated full outside off, driven to the off side of the pitch and Duminy doesn't stop it cleanly
flighted full outside off, driven to deep cover region
turns away from the off stump line, Ferguson hangs on the back foot, waits for it to turn and opens the blade to run it down through vacant slip region
leans forward to drive through to deep cover point region
on the middle stump line, turning towards off, pushed back to the bowler
comes forward to drive to cover
beaten comprehensively. It landed on the off and middle line, gripped and turned past the waft.

cutting in from outside off, jabbed close on the off side towards point and AB rushes across and flicks a throw as he flies in the air. The ball goes over the stumps but the batsman would have been in even if that had hit
short of length, pushed to point
full and just outside off, shuffles across to push it to the on side
short in length, outside off, again he walks right across the sticks, opens the bat face and guides it to backward point
outside off stump, curving away from back of length, tries to run it down to third man, feet caught in a tangle and is beaten. No slip in place.
short in length, outside off stump, punched to wide third man where Albie does a fine diving stop .. The crowd show their appreciation
yorker length on the off stump line, dug out to the off side
another really full delivery, short of the blockhole, though,  driven to deep cover region
cutting in towards the hips, turned to square leg
slower one outside off stump, checks his shot and steers it past the diving point for a single
charges out, Albie fires the yorker, dug out to third man region
leans forward to push it to cover
moves outside leg stump and carves a short--of-length delivery over backward point for a fine boundary
shuffles outside off,  Steyn fires in a bouncer further outside off, Ferguson lets it go and Rudi extends his arms
threatens to move towards off before moving outside leg, Steyn follows him with a full delivery, pushed to mid-on for a quick single
short in length, around 149 kph, mistimes the pull shot to midwicket
slower, outside leg, turned to deep backward square leg
moves outside leg, Steyn pushes it outside off, and Ferguson can't connect
moves outside off stump, Steyn keeps his calm and slips in a slower one, full, leading edge to the off side results
fires across a low full toss just outside off, shuffles across, tries to flick and edges it to his pad and it rolls off to cover point
leans forward to drive well but can't beat cover
length delivery, pushed to mid-on for a single
moves outside leg, Albie follows him , squeezed down to fine leg, who now moves up for Hopes. Deep midwicket in place
eases this to long-on for a single
yorker on the stumps, dug out bat and pad close together, they appeal for a lbw ... have to see the replay to see if there was any bat involved
low full toss around the leg stump, driven wide of long-on for couple of runs
full pitched, short of the blockhole, on the off stump line, square driven to point
low full toss, going for the yorker, pushed down to long-on
above waist-high full toss outside leg, trying to follow the batsman and it runs away to the fine-leg boundary
driven through the on side for a single
shuffles towards middle and off, leans over to push to wide midwicket for a single
overpitched outside off and drilled past the diving cover fielder ... It was right up there in the slot and he had a swing
full in length, driven to long-off for a single. 50 of the partnership up.
walks across the sticks, Albie keeps it outside off, punched past the diving Albie for a single
gets forward t o drive to long--on, they want a second but the throw comes in quickly and they kill the thought
clears the front foot, has a slog but ends up dragging it to forward square leg
Aha .. he threatened to move towards off before quickly shifting outside leg to lift a straight delivery high over extra cover for a fab boundary
low full toss, again not getting the yorker right, driven to deep midwicket region
again the yorker goes awry, full toss, just below the hips, tucked away to deep backward square leg
slower one, on the leg stump line, checks his shot and pushes it wide of midwicket for a single
moves outside leg, Steyn follows him with a full delivery, steered to point .. direct hit by AB at the striker's end and the crowd roar
backs away outside leg, Steyn bangs it in short and follows Ferguson who arches back to dab it to gully region
gets the yorker right this time but slips over and falls after release! It was dug out towards cover. Steyn smiles.
full pitched outside off stump and he backs away to crash it through extra cover. Fine shot that. He picked the gap superbly
Follows that with a good ol' across-the-line swipe. It was short in length and he was cramped slightly but dragged it to square leg boundary
fuller, on the middle, driven between deep midwicket and long-on and they will pick up two runs. Good start to the over by Hopes.
low full toss, chipped towards long-off for a single

shifts outside leg stump, follows him with a full delivery, whipped to deep midwicket region and that's his fifty. The crowd applaud and his team-mates too celebrate. The batsmen get together in the middle.
driven through the off side for a single
floated full around off stump, lunges out to loft over the on side but gets a leading edge over cover
tries to sweep from outside off, misses and Boucher whips off the bails
slows up the pace, he is too early with the sweep shot and bottom edges it to his pad and it rolls away the off side
quicker, short in length, skidding in, tucked past midwicket
played away toward deep midwicket for another single
floated full on the middle, tries to go for the reverse sweep but doesn't connect as well he would have like; would still pick a single to backward point region
moves outside leg and lifts it over extra cover. What a cracking start. Do we have a twist in the tale?
gets forward to drive to long-off for a single
sweeps to deep backward square leg for a single
skips down the track, loopy delivery dips rapidly, dragged to short fine leg
leans forward to drive to long-on
full delivery on the middle and Ferguson goes down town. Fierce heave and he will pick up another boundary.
drives to Steyn at long-on for a single
moves outside leg stump, fires it in full, dug out to the on side for a single
skips down the track, short in length and skidding on, tries to clip it away but it rolls of his pad to the off side
stretches forward to ping long-on
almost cleaned up. He went for the reverse sweep, fails to get bat on ball but it runs past the off stump and to fine-leg as Boucher doesn't collect

chips down the track, tries for the big lofted shot over the off-side field but ends up slicing it high in the air and AB get around from covers to take it. Ferguson falls after leading a fine lower-order effort.
leans forward to drive through to long-off
leans forward to dig the full delivery towards midwicket for a very quick single
Mitch waltzes down the track and lifts it high over long-off for a six. He has been left with too much to do here, though.
fires it in quick and is struck on the pad
pushes that one through quick, full, jabbed out to the off side
slips in well down the leg side and Boucher can't get across in time
swung to deep midwicket for a single

short in length, outside off stump, punched through cover point and Mitchell runs back for the second run. The throw, fast and accurate, comes in from Duminy from the deep and Boucher breaks the stumps. They go the third umpire. OUT!
full in length outside off stump, punched out to cover
short in length, just outside off stump, stays adjacent to the line and forces it to deep backward point boundary
shout for lbw but the point of impact was outside off stump. He leaned forward to drive through the on side and the yorker hit his boot just outside off
almost at the blockhole, pushed down to long-on for a single
low full toss on the off stump, swatted to left of long-on where Steyn rushes across but stumbles as he makes the stop
full pitched on the legs, Hopes brings up his fifty with a drag-flick to deep backward square leg boundary. The fine leg was in the circle
full pitched around off, driven to deep cover for a single
tries to swing it to the on side and it rolls away off the pad
That good old inside edge to fine-leg . Really full delivery, the bat comes down in an angle and the ball flies past the leg stump
backs away to give himself some room and lifts it high over extra cover
fullish, driven back down the track
short in length, a flat-batted , forehand shot to the off side ..
moves outside leg, Steyn fires in a yorker outside leg, dug out to the off side
slower one, tries to swing it away, misses and it rolls off the body to the on side
banged in short, Geeves goes for the flat-batted forehand cross court to long-on ... and smiles ..
slower one, full, leans forward to push it through the on side  ..250 up
low full toss on the leg and middle, gets it wide of long-on for couple of runs. Just one more over left.
fullish outside off stump, sliced to backward point
full again, gets it down to long-off, Mitchell had turned for the second but Hopes sends him back and he gets back just in time
big swing and a miss. But Boucher also fails to stop the slower one that bounces before him and runs through ...
another across-the-line swipe, misses it and it bounds away off the thigh pad through the vacant slip region
lovely slower one outside off, Geeves is through with the shot too early and Boucher collects
full pitched on the stumps, driven to long-off for couple of runs .. And South Africa win by 25 runs. They take the lead in the series.
